channel.title: How Do I Send My Client?
channel.description: Hey, i have a client and a source right, but people can only play if they have the client. how would i send them the client with all the correct files?

item.title: How Do I Send My Client?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Open WinRAR and then click you’re Server with the Lists you get below all the Icons at the Top.
Next Click “add”
Cheak all the files and make sure the box is ticked under RAR not ZIP and then click okay.

Once you done that Use Uppit.com
Rapidshare.com
Mediafile.com

Either one of those Sites to Upload it and then collect the Link it gives you then post the Link to you’re Friends

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Send My Client?
